titles.title: Encouragement of Electronic Benefit Transfer Systems Act
To exempt from the Regulation E requirements, State administration of the food stamp program through electronic benefit transfer systems that provide for distribution of means-tested benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 6/20/1996--Introduced. Encouragement of Electronic Benefit Transfer Systems Act - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to exempt food stamp benefits delivered through an electronic transfer system from specified requirements of the Electronic Fund Transfer Act and regulations of the Federal Reserve System.
